txt.en: The water bubbles and glows for a moment before the darkness and mirk returns
This is the pool below the Twisted Grove
The Twisted Grove has a pool of water beneath it that feeds the roots of the trees and Wood-trolls there.

'Beneath the Twisted Grove is a pool of water. From this source, the trees and Wood-trolls' roots bring in their nutrients...and also their corruption. The waters of that pool are foul and poisoned.

'I have collected a few more of Longbough's tears and believe that they may purify this pool like they did the Gauradan-tainted one. 

'Head within the Twisted Grove and pour this into the waters below.'
The Twisted Grove is south-west of the Eavespires.\n\nRemmenylf asked you to go to the Twisted Grove and pour the Ent's tear into the pool beneath it.
'It did not work, you say? The evil that is concentrated there must be ancient and foul to resist Longbough.'
Remmenylf is at the Eavespires, north-east of the Twisted Grove.\n\nRemmenylf will be dismayed to hear that the Ent's tears did not purify the waters.
'If this works, the Wood-trolls should become trees and return to sleep.'
Pour the phial into the water
Reach the pool below the Twisted Grove
Talk to Remmenylf at the Eavespires
